WE have created our webservices using WS security. Due to this we are getting following error. Please let me know if there is an enhancement available.
<soap:Fault>
 <faultcode>q0:Security</faultcode>
 <faultstring>Header http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing:Action for ultimate recipient is required but not present in the message.</faultstring>
 <faultactor>http://64r2mac16/HEFoundationiService/SISConnectorSvc.asmx</faultactor>
